alert.note: Alert for Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 10:23PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cherry County through 1000 PM MDT... At 923 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Medicine Lake, or 36 miles southeast of Martin, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cody, Medicine Lake, Schoolhouse Lake and Steer Creek Campground. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 152 and 158. Highway 97 near mile marker 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
